name: Pretender to the Crown
description:
twitter | facebook | website | press contact | more games

X : action
Z : undo
R : retry

Free your allies (blue) and leave to win.
Stuck an opponent (red) between you and an ally to eliminate it.

By Colin Thil, after a play by Henrik Ibsen
Mechanics inspired by Norwegian chess game
Music : Grieg, Elegy for piano op. 34 n. 1 (1880)

Made with puzzlescript(Increpare)
